Name: Scorched Islands
About the game: Scorched Islands is a remake of classic turn-based artillery game. Move to one of islands and fight with AI or other players at the keyboard. Set shooting angles and power and destroy enemy tanks. 5 islands with different conditions and environement Various weather effects affecting the battle Full balistics physics Surprises do discover JOIN THE BATTLE
